modName: My Little Skyrim Main Menu Music Replacer
summary: Replaces the default main menu music with the My Little Skyrim theme.
descriptionHtml: This mod replaces the main menu music with the audio track called My Little Skyrim, which is a video that makes the Skyrim main theme but with noises from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. This obviously is compatible with Dawnguard and Hearthfire because it does absolutely nothing ingame, all it does is replace the music playing on the main menu. Nexus Mod Manager recommended for this.
author: moutaindew101
